episodes.title: Rory Kennedy's new HBO docuseries follows Synanon's path from drug treatment to violent cult
episodes.description:
What began as a treatment program for struggling addicts became something much worse at the hands of an aggressive leader. Rory Kennedy dives into the Synanon cult in the new HBO docuseries “The Synanon Fix.” She joined Gautam Mukunda to discuss.

0:00 
0:40 What is Synanon?
1:48 The dive into a cult
3:15 Synanon broke the cult mode
5:00 Synanon members forced into physical changes
6:30 Daughter of Synanon leader speaks
8:30 Why are we fascinated by cults?
11:42 Rory talks fall of Boeing & CEO stepping down
